title: WTTF: High Grade T206 Mike Powers Sweet Cap Fact. 649 OP
author: christopher.herman

posts.post_title: WTTF: High Grade T206 Mike Powers Sweet Cap Fact. 649 OP
posts.post_content:
Hello all,

I'd like to upgrade this card to a sharper example: T206 Mike Powers Sweet Caporal 150 Subjects Factory 649 Overstrike.

I could offer this SGC 50 (as a replacement) plus cash and/or trades (trade bait [URL="http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/christopher_herman"]here[/URL]) to make up the difference.

Show me what you got. PM me and we'll talk.

~Christopher.

Bump. Anyone have a higher grade example that they are willing to part with?
-Christopher.

posts.post_title: Just for the hell of it....
posts.post_content:
I'll post mine.  Not sure if it's better or worse, so I'll look at them both in the same place.

Scan deleted so as not to influence folks with interest in Chris' Powers card.  Mine is not for sale.
Nice card and, yes, I guess my scanner could use an upgrade.
